name: Three-Ingredient Mug Cake
description: Quick and Easy Single-Serve Protein Cake
ingredients: Optional: Toppings of choice (like peanut butter or dark chocolate)
instructions: Mix protein powder and baking powder in a microwave-safe mug
Add a splash of water and stir until smooth batter forms
Microwave for 60-90 seconds until cake is set
Top with optional toppings like peanut butter or dark chocolate
